resources.string: Lily, a cat with a graceful posture, prefers comfortable windows and soft pillows. Her hobbies are carefree climbing paths in her own kingdom during the day and catching stars in the window at night.
Rex, a dog with a cheerful personality and boundless energy, loves adventures and walks in the park. He is always ready to entertain his owner with his liveliness.
Flops, a fluffy little rabbit, loves to nibble on fresh grass and hide in his burrow. Each of them is brought into our lives in its own unique way, which makes our environment brighter and richer.
